name: Shane Dunlap
coverLetter:
I trimmed for the last 3 years before I moved to Los Angeles, I lived in the Seirrra Nevada Mountain 
range and up there everyone grows.  Depending on how close you want the trim job I can do a pound in 5 to 8 hours.  I love cannabis and the positive community behind it, I would love to become an productive member of your trim team!
